DOC.detailed_description: Safety Study male subject mild ED ( erectile dysfunction )
DOC.criteria: No mild ED ( erectile dysfunction ) willing & able provide 2 semen sample without use PDE5 inhibitor exclude medication device 2 separate day screen Weeks 12 & 26 BMI ( body mass index ) 19 31 kilogram/meter square New onset coronary artery disease within last 3 month , history myocardial infarction cardiac surgical procedure within last 6 month sudden cardiac arrest Nitrate medication angina pectoris Used antiarrhythmic drug treatment device Congestive heart failure Uncontrolled diabetes Stroke transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) within last 6 month Bleeding disorder history GI bleeding within last 12 month Cancer chemotherapy History alcohol drug abuse
